summary.label:
LuxTrust Mobile – carry out your most sensitive online operations directly from your smartphone and without using any hard devices (such as the classic Token or a Scan).

WHAT DOES LUXTRUST MOBILE DO?
LuxTrust Mobile allows you to:
- Securely access our partner websites (banks, e-government, …)
- Confirm and validate online financial transactions
- Sign documents electronically directly 
- Perform various operations on guichet.lu

HOW TO ACTIVATE IT?
If you already are a LuxTrust customer and have your Token or Scan at hand, simply install it and follow the steps indicated in the app. 
If you are not a LuxTrust client and you want to use the app, order your LuxTrust electronic identity on www.luxtrust.lu. 

HOW TO USE IT?
LuxTrust has three main modes:
- App2App: Once set-up in your banking app, LuxTrust Mobile can automatically exchange with it so that you do not need to enter an OTP (one-time password). You just have to confirm or cancel the operation. Please check with your bank how to enable this feature.

- Scan the QR code (mosaic image) when connecting to a website using a desktop or tablet:  You will select LuxTrust mobile instead of the Token for instance. You can then scan the QR code displayed after entering your User ID and Password. The app decrypts the image and generates the OTP (one-time password) you need to insert on the website.

- Receive a Push Notification when accessing to our partners’ website from a desktop, tablet or smartphone. Partners’ websites having this feature enabled will automatically send you a notification asking you to confirm or cancel the specific operation. You can also find it under “Pending transactions”.

OTHER FEATURES
You can activate your LuxTrust Mobile app on a second device (like a tablet) and enable TouchID or FaceID to unlock it, for more convenience.

DO YOU NEED HELP?
If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact our Helpdesk at +352 24 550 550 or by email at: helpdesk@luxtrust.lu.

SECURITY NOTICE
Before installation and as well as during utilisation, please ensure that your devices (smartphone, tablet, etc.) are appropriately secured and protected. For security reasons, LuxTrust do not accept rooted or jailbroken devices and cannot be held liable in case such devices are used.
To remain protect at all times, do not disclose your security codes, PINs, and passwords to anyone. 
If you suspect that your device or credentials have been compromised, stop using the app and immediately notify LuxTrust by telephone at +352 24 550 550. Our colleagues from Helpdesk will offer you support and guidance. 

ABOUT LUXTRUST
LuxTrust is leading European electronic identity and trust services provider. Certified and acting in compliance with the latest European regulations (eIDAS, PSD2, GDPR, ETSI), LuxTrust delivers digital services related to the identification and authentication (required to equip individuals with a valid electronic identity and to secure access to websites and applications) and the creation and validation of electronic signatures.

Download passbolt’s mobile app to take your passwords with you, wherever you go. All the features of the web application that you love, packed into a password manager app on your mobile device. Secure encryption, form autofill, biometric and multiple-factor authentication - everything you need to safely generate, store and use your credentials on the go. 

What’s so special about passbolt mobile?
	•	Fully Open source and based on proven security standards. 
	•	Biometric authentication - Log in and unlock passwords with fingerprint or face ID 
	•	2FA secure login - Use your Yubikey with NFC to securely sign in 
	•	Auto-fill - Automatically fill in credentials with ease on your mobile device 

Based in Luxembourg, passbolt is secure by default. The open-source password manager’s security model follows strict end-to-end encryption principles. For the mobile app, one of the ways this takes shape is the fact that private keys are transferred from browser to app off the wire, through multiple QR codes. 

The app, like the passbolt project, is always evolving - striving to be better and offer users the best experience with the features they need most. Join the passbolt community to see what others are saying in the forum (https://community.passbolt.com/t/mobile-app-for-passbolt/2941), or take a look at the passbolt roadmap (https://www.passbolt.com/roadmap).

Our patented infrastructure (Patent no. 10-2013-******) makes sure that all user account and activity information is completely disconnected from the encrypted email verification process. IDnow Online Ident allows you to digitally verify your identity or sign contracts electronically in just a few minutes. All you need is a mobile device, a stable internet connection, and a valid ID document. 
Save yourself the hassle of queuing up to show your ID card at a bank or postal office. IDnow Online Ident offers highly secure and officially accepted ways to digitally prove your identity or sign contracts online. And the best part is: It is completely free of charge and only requires a few minutes of your time.
IDnow VideoIdent: Our default identification method will connect you with one of our ident specialists via video chat. This expert will guide you throughout the entire process. Have your ID document ready and just follow the easy instructions. 
IDnow eID: Where applicable, you may have the option to quickly verify your identity via a German electronic ID card without the need for a video chat. All you need is an NFC-enabled smartphone that serves as a card-reader and securely transmits the encrypted data of your eID. 
IDnow eSign: You will also be able to digitally sign relevant documents at the end of the video identification process. The process can be completed in just a few minutes from the comfort of your home, avoiding any media mismatch or need of additional hardware.
Be assured that your personal data is safe with us as all our identification processes are being audited regularly and comply with the highest security standards.
IDnow Online Ident runs on iPads and iPhones with iOS 9 or higher.
IDnow is a market-leading provider for identity verification and electronic signature solutions. For further information go on our website https://www.idnow.io/ . 
In case you need support with the identity verification itself, directly go to https://help.idnow.io/hc/en-gb .
Please note that IDnow also offers the app IDnow AutoIdent for AI-powered identification. If your token is not accepted on the home screen, you may need to switch to the IDnow AutoIdent app.
